channel.title: Welcome on My Study Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on My Study Notes

item.title: Study Notes Website Revamp
item.description: A project focused on redesigning my study notes site using the Hugo framework and PaperMod theme.

item.title: About
item.description:
About This Site

This website serves as my personal hub for study notes, tutorials and projects.
I am passionate about continual learning and enjoy documenting concepts in a way that makes them easy to reference and revisit later.

The notes section contains articles organized by topic with clear tables of contents, descriptive summaries and syntax‑highlighted code blocks.
In the projects section you’ll find examples of how I’ve applied these concepts in real‑world scenarios.

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: A gentle introduction to Python programming language covering syntax, variables, data types and basic control structures.

item.title: Understanding Data Structures
item.description: Overview of fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues and how to choose the right one.
